translations: n.投机，投机买卖；猜测，推测，推断

sentences.sentence: What can happen during this phase can be only a matter for speculations, for what Freud called "metapsychology".
sentences.translation: 在这一阶段可能发生的事情仅仅是猜测，弗洛伊德称之为“心理玄学”。

sentences.sentence: All of this offers pegs for the patient on which to hang his speculations, phantasize, and recollections.
sentences.translation: 所有这些都为病人提供了钉住他的推测、幻像和回忆的钉子。

sentences.sentence: None of those speculations are true.
